name: ExampleAgent
bio: Bio lines are each short snippets which can be composed together in a random order.
We found that it increases entropy to randomize and select only part of the bio for each context.
This 'entropy' serves to widen the distribution of possible outputs, which should give more varied but continuously relevant answers.
lore: Lore lines are each short snippets which can be composed together in a random order, just like bio
However these are usually more factual or historical and less biographical than biographical lines
Lore lines can be extracted from chatlogs and tweets as things that the character or that happened to them
Lore should also be randomized and sampled from to increase entropy in the context
postExamples: These are examples of tweets that the agent would post
These are single string messages, and should capture the style, tone and interests of the agent's posts
adjectives: these can be madlibbed into prompts

knowledge.content: Full extracted text knowledge from documents that the agent should know about. These can be ingested into any agent knowledge retrieval / RAG system.

all: These are directions for how the agent should speak or write
One trick is to write the directions themselves in the style of the agent
chat: These directions are specifically injected into chat contexts, like Discord
post: These directions are specifically injected into post contexts, like Twitter
